text:
[Verse]
Woke up to the sky so gray
But the sun it found a way
Pushed the clouds they ran away
Bringing light into the day

[Verse 2]
Puddles glisten on the street
Dancing shoes on my two feet
Raindrops sparkling as they meet
Sunshine makes the world complete

[Chorus]
Sunshine on a rainy day
Makes me wanna shout hooray
Life's a game we love to play
Chasing clouds and skies so gray

[Verse 3]
Rainbow's colors in the air
Paint the sky with love and care
Magic moments we can share
With sunshine everywhere

[Chorus]
Sunshine on a rainy day
Makes me wanna shout hooray
Life's a game we love to play
Chasing clouds and skies so gray

[Bridge]
When it's dark and storms appear
Close your eyes the sun is near
Feel the warmth and lose the fear
Brightness soon will reappear
title: Sunshine on a Rainy Day
